extends java.lang.Object
    A GiftDataManager gets the information from the gift.csv

      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Gift> getGiftRecords(User u)

      void writeToCSV()
      This method adds Gift record to the CSV file It loops through inventoryMap, fetchs all gift records in giftMap and then write to the CSV file accordingly It returns error messages if there's exception

      • writeToCSV

        public void writeToCSV()
        This method adds Gift record to the CSV file It loops through inventoryMap, fetchs all gift records in giftMap and then write to the CSV file accordingly It returns error messages if there's exception

      • getGiftRecords

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Gift> getGiftRecords(User u)
        This method returns a specific user's giftMap It loops through the whole gitMap and gets all gift records of the specific user Then add the records to new map of giftRecords.
        Parameters:
        u - the logged user
        Returns:
        Map of gift records
